title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: E-Learning Service Providers Using Fuzzy Logic-Based QFD

context.prior_knowledge: Experience operating online learning platforms or foundational knowledge in educational service management
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can create evaluation checklists for e-learning service providers using fuzzy logic-based QFD methodology
Learners can analyze expert survey data using the CFCS technique and perform CRITIC scoring
Learners can select optimal service providers based on core success factors such as learning effectiveness, technical stability, and cost efficiency
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
